Name: Pathosis
About the game: Pathosis is an early access Combat-RPG game created by experienced players. The game itself is taking place in an infected medieval world where a few selected knights, that have survived the pathosis, fight against the undead warriors that roam the world. As you progress throughout the game, not only will your character grow stronger and learn new skills, but you, as a player, will develop new playstyles and gain knowledge that will greatly improve your chance of survival in this ever more difficult world. Explore the world of Pathosis and save it from this great infection!
